name: HttpStatus_getReasonPhraseTest
description: Unit tests for the HttpStatus.getReasonPhrase method.

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhrase_ValidStatusCode
test_cases.description: Tests the getReasonPhrase method with a valid status code (200).

test_cases.name: testGetReasonPhrase_NegativeStatusCode
test_cases.description: Tests the getReasonPhrase method with a negative status code, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
